I am getting a very strange result from juint.

The following is the results of a unit test, but as you can see, it is
not being caught as a failure or error.  The unit test is catching
Exception, but this is the result.

We have our unit tests implemented as inner classes, could that make a
difference with this?  I am very confused by this.  Using the junit
target in Ant to produce these results.

Thoughts?

Jesse

--
